titleInfo.title: Letter from John Monckton, Acting Secretary to the Government at Fort William to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter asking a series of detailed questions regarding Bruce's financial dealings, especially concerning a loan made by Bruce to Mohamed Nubee Khan [Muhammad Nabi Khan]. The letter also includes a detailed memorandum and statement of interest due, prepared by W Egerton, Accountant General at Fort William [Calcutta], for John Monkton.
